name: Tangaria
summary: Tangaria is multiplayer roguelike game (MMO-roguelike). Tangaria combines the complexity and unpredictability of roguelike genre and social features of MMORPG: kill monsters together with your friends, chat, PvP (on demand), buy a house and open a store to trade your goods with other players… with advanced real-time gameplay – game become semi turn-based when your character is injured.
